duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a book of Commercial Property & Casualty Insurance business, ensuring accurate and timely completion of all required tasks.
Assist in ensuring accurate and timely processing of new and renewal insurance policies by tracking policy expirations, facilitating renewals, and notifying of any discrepancies.
Provide support in new business and renewal business workflows, including client research, loss run analysis, and preparing complete and accurate submissions.
Review all policies, identifying and notifying of any discrepancies, and ensuring all necessary changes are submitted and issued by the carrier.
Build positive client relationships, provide high levels of advocacy, world-class service, and professional communication.
Continually grow insurance expertise, management/leadership skills, and followership skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Insurance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
